articles.title: Nvidia boss meeting Saudis, xAI raising funds, Targets earnings
articles.body: Nvidias NVDA CEO Jensen Huang and Teslas TSLA boss, Elon Musk are set to take part in US-Saudi discussions in Washington. that is according to a document seen by Reuters. According to the Wall Street Journal, Elon Musks xAI is looking to raise $15 billion in funding that would value it at $230 billion. Target TGT slashed it future guidance and predicts a weak holiday season. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

articles.title: AMD, Intel and TSMC brace for Nvidia earnings trending stocks
articles.body: Stocks of chipmakers including AMD AMD, Intel INTC and TSMC TSM, TSMC.BA waver as markets hold their breath ahead of Nvidia NVDAs earnings report. Cloudflare NET ticks up despite a widespread outage. Tesla TSLA challenger Xiaomi 1810.HK, XIACY, XIACF, 3CP.F, 1810N.MX sees shares plummet - even as its EV arm turns an operating profit for the first time. Following a crisis sparked by an accounting error in its North American division, British high-street retailer WH Smith SMWH.L pushes for a turnaround. And Doordash DASH delivers some news - including a new partnership. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

articles.title: AI boom will continue despite bubble fears Arm CMO
articles.body: Arm ARM Holdings, the semiconductor design company that lists Microsoft MSFT, Nvidia NVDA, Meta META and Apple AAPL among its many partners, expects surging revenue driven by AI - even as fears of a bubble keep growing. Chief Marketing Officer Ami Badani spoke with Ramzan Karmali about the firms strategy to expand across data centers and mobile devices, while continuing to push for more energy-efficient chips. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

articles.title: Magnite Launches Live Scheduler To Advance How Media Owners and Advertisers Transact on Live Streaming Content
articles.body: First-to-market solution establishes a standardized workflow for scalable live event monetization Roku among first to utilize Live SchedulerNEW YORK, Nov. 18, 2025 GLOBE NEWSWIRE -- Magnite NASDAQMGNI, the largest independent sell-side advertising company, today introduced Live Scheduler, an industry-first offering. articles.title: Are You Richer Than You Think? here is The Net Worth You Need To Be Among The Top 10 percent Of Households
articles.body: Most people grow up picturing rich the way movies taught them to piles of money, a house big enough to get lost in, maybe a limo in the driveway and a lifestyle that sparkles a little too much to feel real. But once you get older, the definition changes. Wealth starts looking less like a hotel lobby you live in and more like stability, options, and a financial cushion that lets you breathe. articles.title: Stocks waver to start the week Alphabet rises on Berkshire stake Live updates
articles.body: The moves followed a choppy week in which valuation fears, a rotation within the market and a recalibration of Fed rate cut expectations pressured the AI trade.
